website_summaries.verdict: Awesome design on this set of 2 fashionable and functional glass coffee mugs.
pros: Hot beverage will not make the outside of this mug too hot to touch
Comes as a set of 2 mugs
cons: There is no handle on these coffee mugs
Like other double walled glass mugs, they are a bit delicate

customer_reviews.title: Don’t let the nice look fool you there is a Water trap
customer_reviews.text: These mugs are nice and very cute but leak between the insulation and outer cup! Literally after the second hand wash there was water trapped inside the insulation and actual cup. When the water starts to evaporate eventually it turns foggy and “dewy”. I did not try it return them (they were bought as a gift and my family threw one away after constant frustration with foggy water sloshing inbetween cup and insulation) but if i had all the cups I would have tried. Do not buy these cups no matter how cute they look. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: tiner

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, very attractive 12 oz. insulated glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice 12 ounce glasses, beautifully shaped and nicely weighted. I have been a fan of double-wall borosilicate glass glasses for years now, and these are a good example. My only suggestion to the seller is to put a small accompanying information sheet in the box. Include information like company name, contact info, care instructions, and the fact that they are both dishwasher and microwave safe (at least according to the Amazon sales page info). Thank you for a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Golightly

customer_reviews.title: DISHWASHER UNsafe
customer_reviews.text: NOT dishwasher safe. I really liked these glass cups...but it cracked in the dishwasher (top shelf, away from bottom dryer/heater, away from other cups/objects). I’ve had it for only 2 months (since July 2018). Hand wash them only! I’ve had two if them crack in the dishwasher on different occasions.
customer_reviews.author: FuzzyFlyer

customer_reviews.title: Fragile :-/
customer_reviews.text: Loved those glasses. They're pretty and convenient. Unfortunately, even though they are supposed to be durable, they're not. Mine broke just by being on the dish rack with a dish over it.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: They can leak
customer_reviews.text: Mugs worked fine for about a week until one started leaking into the sealed inner chamber.
customer_reviews.author: Carl K.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mugs
customer_reviews.text: These are my absolute favorite mugs-pretty much the only ones I use now. So comfortable to hold, and you cant feel the heat of your coffee through them so they work really well. I broke one of them because I'm really clumsy, but they hold up really well in general.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Water seeped into a little hole in bottom of cup ...
customer_reviews.text: Water seeped into a little hole in bottom of cup and I had to throw it out because it wouldn't drain completely.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly sams

customer_reviews.title: Taste better with glass
customer_reviews.text: Ahhhh just what I needed. Taste better with glass, now my day can be productive!
customer_reviews.author: Toby Wilansky

customer_reviews.title: Just opened my new glasses. They are exactly what ...
customer_reviews.text: Just opened my new glasses. They are exactly what I was looking for. They exceed my expectations! Definitely would purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Randall D. Scruggs

customer_reviews.title: Easily break
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the cups and they kept my hands from getting burned when holding hot drinks. They did not last too long though, both cups broke from gently being tipped over on a counter. I do not recommend these cups since it's a matter of time before they break.
customer_reviews.author: azak

customer_reviews.title: Great cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy my coffee at the perfect temperature, for a longer time.
customer_reviews.author: QueMan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty and easy to wash.I am a slow coffee drinker so it keeps my coffee warm longer
customer_reviews.author: Alectis Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Great product really like them
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my coffee warm lite weight.can I put them in the dish washer?Great product really like them.
customer_reviews.author: jerry stephens

customer_reviews.title: Adorable glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses! They make the coffee experience so much more refreshing!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Williams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are great glasses. They look really nice, and even despite there being no handles, the glasses don't get hot. One thing to keep in mind in regards to durability. Any double wall glass you buy is going to be very fragile. You need to handle these with a lot more care than a regular mug. At some point, you will probably break them. But that doesn't mean they are flimsy, they're just delicate. I've owned many brands of double wall glasses and have broken many of them. These do feel a bit more solid than other's I've owned though.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and useful-what more could you want.
customer_reviews.text: Just received these today and made my first cup of coffee. The mugs are so pretty and show off the color of the coffee and foam. Easy to handle and not hot to the touch, but keep the coffee hot. So far-one time use, I couldn't be happier. Hopefully they will be sturdy and hold up to the dishwasher or microwave as stated. Will repost if anything negative happens.
customer_reviews.author: movie watcher

customer_reviews.title: There are good proportions.
customer_reviews.text: As for me this is the very nice proportion between capacity, height and three diameters (top, middle and bottom). When the glass is filled by the boiling water I can hold this glass without any problem.
customer_reviews.author: V. Sakovich

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, and not as fragile as they look
customer_reviews.text: These work well, keep the heat of hot beverages from making the holding the mug uncomfortable, and they're reasonable durable. I dropped one from about three feet up to a hardwood floor with no damage.
customer_reviews.author: G. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for morning coffee, stylish and capable of being held in your hand without getting to warm to handle.
customer_reviews.author: BTKD

customer_reviews.title: Saw them in Denmark...
customer_reviews.text: Saw these while in Denmark, loved them and ordered a set. The wife has trouble holding them as they are pretty large and her hands are small. But, I love them. Look good, insulate well, feels good.
customer_reviews.author: FlyingBlind

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice mugs. Used them for a few months now with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: TSafe Customer Service

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality cups that are way sturdier than any other sets I’ve had
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Shifrin

customer_reviews.title: Great mugs!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful coffee mugs. They are well insulated and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas L. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quite frankly one of my favorite cups to use, regardless of what I'm drinking.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

product_meta.title: Sweese 4604 Glass Coffee Mugs - 12 Ounces, Double Wall Insulated Glasses Suitable for Cappuccino, Latte, Cream, Tea, Kinds of Beverage, Set of 2
product_meta.description:
Searching for a drinking mug? Sweese coffee mugs might be the most durable mugs for any beverage lover. They feature sturdy base, smooth lines, large handle, great capacity, and stylish design. Simple and classy, they could be an ideal gift to share with your family and friends. 

No more burnt hand 
The double wall insulation really preserve heat well. Not only do the coffee stay warm longer than a regular mug, but the glass (handle included) is cool to the touch. You will never burn your hand on a hot beverage! 

Practical and functional 
Due to the great capacity, cute glass mugs fit nicely for espresso machines or coffee makers, and perfectly sized for espresso, tea, coffee, latte, mocha, cappuccino, juice etc.. More importantly, they keep your drink either hot or cold. Buy these mugs to enhance your enjoyment of drinking! 

Dishwasher & Microwave safe 
Made of borosilicate glass, these mugs are light weight but durable. It’s OK for you to use dishwasher to wash them up, or reheat them in the microwave 

A silicone plug 
There’s a small round silicone seal on the bottom that covers the hole which is a special device that allows the glass to breathe. This innovation is what makes the glass work without steam or condensation. No drips, no condensation. So amazing! 

Add Sweese Handless Coffee Mugs to your collection now!
feature_bullets: QUALITY GLASS & DOUBLE WALL DESIGN - Sweese glass mug is make of high borosilicate glass that would be more lighter and durable than common glass, What’s more, double-walled cups without burning your hand and without sweating

SAVE SPACE ADN SUITABLE SIZE - The diameter 3.26 inch， big enough to stack that will help you save space. The glass cups hold 12 oz to the rim, suitable for espresso machine, perfect for cappuccino, latte, cream, tea, cereal, kinds of beverage.

AN IDEAL GIFT - Beautifully shaped and well wrapped in a gift box, cool coffee mugs could be the ideal gift for your family or friends especially on special occasions such as birthday, housewarming, wedding, parties, Father’s Day etc.

EASY ENOUGH TO CLEAN UP - Nicely built, espresso mugs feel so smooth and sleek. Therefore, it is very easy to wash with soap and water, leaving no dry spots. Plus they are dishwasher and microwave safe.
SWEESE 30 DAYS WARRANTY - Your satisfaction is great honor for us, so sweese provide warranty that if anything goes wrong about the product within 30 days, will replace the item at no cost to you.
